"Sir." came Scourge's reply. As he had =
been flying around the outside
of the base as a sentry, he quickly made his=
 way inside shifting to
his robot form.

> while he waited the answer He lo=
oked to Rodimus and Cyclonus and said "You two, it isnt time for petty quar=
rels so I expect that while I'm cheking the reseach Section dont kill each =
other... I want that you two work together and seal this base...I dont desi=
re any unwanted visitor; after you finish go to the throne room and wait me=

, keep me informed"

Cyclonus smiled slightly as he nodded to Hydras, "Yes =
sir." he said
easily enough.

Rodimus on the other hand looked a bit put of=
f, his face lapsing into
a frown. he glanced over at Cyclonus, and caught t=
hat small smile,
which only deepened his frown. Finally he turned back to H=
ydras, "Yes
sir." he said, his words obedient, but only barely so.

As Hydr=
as left the room and Rodimus and Cyclonus went to work, there
was something=
 in Rodimus' stance that said that this disagreement
wasn't over, just on p=
ause.

Cyclonus on the other hand seemed totally calm as he worked. Casuall=
y
he put in a call to Scourge,  "Scourge, report to the throne room and
ass=
ist Scorponok, we will be there shortly."

eply.
